text:
"The Light Fantastic" is a fantasy book by Terry Pratchett. It was published in 1986 and it is the second book in the "Discworld" series.
Plot.
The book follows on from "The Colour of Magic". Rincewind the cowardly wizard continues his adventure with Twoflower the Discworld's first tourist.
Adaptations.
A TV version of the book was made with David Jason playing the part of Rincewind, and Christopher Lee playing the part of Death.
